Title: Skywrath Mage - Ganking Nuker build - Mid

ItemTooltips.sheepstick: More expensive than RoA, but this allows you to contribute more in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Another tool to use if you are getting jumped on a lot in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Your spells have huge range, so you shouldn't put yourself in a bad position. Get this if the enemy team is constantly targetting you in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: Absolute core. You need high mana regen to cast multiple Mystic Flares in teamfights. Dissemble your Arcane Boots to build it.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: For when you're so far ahead and just want to add insult to injury.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: You can get this or Phase Boots after dissembling your Arcane Boots if you can't get the farm for BoT.

AbilityTooltips.skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt: Use it to harass constantly in lane, or to last hit at level 1.
AbilityTooltips.skywrath_mage_ancient_seal: For lower levels, cast Ancient Seal after firing your Arcane Bolt to get the most out of the damage increase.
AbilityTooltips.skywrath_mage_mystic_flare: Make sure you have mana for this when ganking,  as the damage from your combo at level 6 is huge.
